snippet: The Spanish tennis federation said it would sue a French TV channel for using its logo in a sketch that suggested that Rafael Nadal and other Spanish athletes used performance-enhancing drugs.
abstract: Spanish tennis federation says it will sue a French TV channel for using its logo in a sketch suggesting that Rafael Nadal and other Spanish athletes used performance-enhancing drugs.
lead_paragraph: The Spanish tennis federation said it would sue a French TV channel for using its logo in a sketch that suggested that Rafael Nadal and other Spanish athletes used performance-enhancing drugs.

headline.seo: Nadal Skit by French TV Angers Spanish Tennis Officials
headline.main: Skit Prompts Threat of Suit From Spain
headline.print_headline: Skit Prompts Threat of Suit From Spain
